knimeNode.name: LAPTrackletCreator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates Tracklets out of a given segmentation as graphs.

fullDescription.intro: Creates tracklets with a linear assignement problem algorithm. It uses the hungarian algorithm to find the connected nodes in each frame to frame segment and puts them together into a tracklet. It also connects tracklets with gaps, if wanted.
fullDescription.option: the threshold used for the calculation if an edge is valid
the max radius that two spots in 2 time frames can have to belong to the same tracklet.
Choose whether gap closing is wanted.
